channel.title: CVE Feed for Mirantis -- Mirantis Container Runtime
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mirantis -- Mirantis Container Runtime

item.title: CVE-2021-23218|2024-08-03T19:05:55.507Z -- mirantis -- mirantis%20container%20runtime
item.description: When running with FIPS mode enabled, Mirantis Container Runtime 20.10.8 leaks memory during TLS Handshakes which could be abused to cause a denial of service.
